mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear Surbhi,

I hope this message finds you well.

Thank you for sharing the updated checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC. I have reviewed it and incorporated the additional data from the PEP screening into the checklist. Below are the updates addressing the previously missing areas:

### Updated Checklist Summary:
| Checklist Item                            | Status     | Comment                                                                                               | Source                               |
|-------------------------------------------|------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                     | Validated  | Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.                        | DIM_CompanyAddressProof              |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.                                    | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details           | Validated  | Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.                    | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails      |
| Company Directorship                       | Missing    | Organization does not release directorship information in its annual report.                        | NA                                   |
| Company Tax Documentation                 | Missing    | Organization does not include details about tax documentation in its annual report.                  | NA                                   |
| Company Regulatory Compliance              | Missing    | Organization does not release information about regulatory compliance in its annual report.          | NA                                   |
| Company Business Scope                    | Validated  | Detailed business scope information is available, highlighting leadership roles and services.       | Annual Report                        |
| Company PEP Screening                     | Identified | PEP screening data shows several individuals flagged, including high-risk individuals.               | PEP Screening Data                   |
| Company Revenue Details                   | Validated  | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.       | Annual Report                        |
| Company Market Capitalization Details     | Validated  | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.               | Annual Report                        |

The JSON file containing the detailed checklist has been securely stored for your reference.

If you have any further questions or need additional details, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
